metadata.title: CVE-2019-5873 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy validation in navigation in Google Chrome on iOS priorto 77.0.3865.75 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents of theOmnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
